Package com.xebisco.yield

Class YldB

java.lang.Object
com.xebisco.yield.YldB
Direct Known Subclasses:
Component, YldScene
public abstract class YldB extends Object
Sample methods for the majority of the Yield Game Engine classes.
Since:
4_alpha1

    • doWhen

      public final void doWhen(YldAction action, Condition condition, MultiThread execAction, MultiThread checkCondition)
      When the condition is true, execute the action. The first thing to notice is that the function takes in a `YldAction` and a `Condition`. The `YldAction` is the action that will be executed when the condition is true. The `Condition` is the condition that must be true for the action to be executed
      Parameters:
      action - The action to be executed when the condition is met.
      condition - The condition to check.
      execAction - The thread that the action will be executed when the condition is met.
      checkCondition - The thread that will check if the action should be executed.

    • doWhen

      public final void doWhen(YldAction action, Condition condition)

    • log

      public void log(Object x)

    • timer

      public final long timer(YldAction action, float time, boolean repeat, MultiThread multiThread)
      Creates a timer.
      Parameters:
      action - The action to be performed on the end of the timer.
      time - The time, in seconds to end the timer.
      repeat - If the timer repeat after it ends.
      multiThread - The thread configuration.

    • timer

      public final long timer(YldAction action, float time, boolean repeat)
      Creates a timer, on the on game thread.
      Parameters:
      action - The action to be performed on the end of the timer.
      time - The time, in seconds to end the timer.
      repeat - If the timer repeat after it ends.
